query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gamificationNotifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('belt_upgrade', 'badge_earned', 'streak_milestone', 'points_milestone') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  isRead BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  relatedData JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gamificationNotifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('belt_upgrade', 'badge_earned', 'streak_milestone', 'points_milestone') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  isRead BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  relatedData JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
